profile.greeting: Welcome to Code Butler {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience. If you want to build a similar one visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc

java.welcome: That's a great choice, one of the most trending languages since 25 years now. Please ask away.
java.one: Ask away any question about Java, I will try to answer

get_started.welcome_1: Hello {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to Code Butler, I will help you learn to code.
get_started.welcome_2: Hello {{userFirstName}}, nice to meet you. I can help you get into coding!
get_started.welcome_3: Greetings {{userFirstName}}, a pleasure to meet you. I will help you improve your coding.
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the options your choice.
get_started.help: What level do you want our conversation to be at?
get_started.choose_language: Choose the programming language you would like to talk about from the below menu.
get_started.choose_another_language: Choose another programming language you would like to talk about from the below menu.

advance.hint: You get to ask advance level questions.

not_available.language_1: Sorry, {{userFirstName}} I'm still working on educating myself with this language. Please take a pick on another language.
not_available.language_2: Life is tricky, I will be better at this language soon, {{userFirstName}}. Try another one for a change.

curation.prompt: Are you looking for an outfit for yourself or someone else?
curation.occasion: Great! Let's get started. First, is there an occasion in mind?
curation.price: How much are you looking to spend?
curation.title: Summer collection 2019
curation.subtitle: Featured outfit

order.prompt: We'll be happy to help you. Select from the following
order.number: Sure, please write the order number
order.status: Your order is on it’s way, expect to have it in 3 days.

languages.prompt: To connect you with the right team please let me know what this is about?
languages.issue: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you with any questions you might have about your {{topic}}.
languages.default: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you today. How can I help you?
languages.style: Hi {{userFirstName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I’m here to answer questions you might have on our summer styles
languages.end: This is as far as the demo goes. Leverage the power of the messenger platform for your business. See https://fb.me/get-sample-oc to learn how to build a similar experience

survey.prompt: Hi, want to get quick feedback on your recent experience with {{agentFirstName}}
survey.neutral: Thanks for the feedback, if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion
survey.negative: Thanks for telling us. Sorry to hear that, if there something we can do to turn this let us know
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team. If this is something we need to get back to you right now just comment "help"

fallback.any: Sorry, but I don’t recognize "{{message}}"! Trying Googling or DuckDuckGo-ing!
fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
